definition: a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)
lit. with swords drawn and bows bent (idiom); fig. a state of mutual hostility/at daggers drawn
lit. an arrow at the end of its flight (idiom)/fig. spent force

sentences.english: But Nunez says drug smugglers are not always easy to catch.
sentences.chinese: 但弩內茲還表示，逮捕毒販一直有其難度。

sentences.english: He has other weapons, too, like a crossbow and bombs.
sentences.chinese: 他還有一些其他的武器，比如弩和炸彈。

sentences.english: Italian crossbow militia, armoured with mail and a pavise.
sentences.chinese: 巨盾持弩民兵裝備鍊甲和全身巨盾。

sentences.english: You'll also need to equip ammunition (crossbow bolts) in the Bolt Ammo Slot by double left-clicking on the bolts.
sentences.chinese: 記住弩需要雙手持握，因此你不能同時裝備盾牌。

sentences.english: These troops are armed with a large shield to protect them during the slow process of reloading their crossbow.
sentences.chinese: 巨盾弩兵揹負全身巨盾，以防裝填弩箭途中遭受攻擊。

sentences.english: War Galleys are larger than normal galleys. Equipped with ballista or catapults.
sentences.chinese: 加列戰艦比戰船更爲巨大，上置弩炮或投石器。

sentences.english: Repeater crossbows is countered by the longbow.
sentences.chinese: 迴應你所謂的用諸葛弩對抗長弓。

sentences.english: Male characters will no longer twist their wrists unnaturally when firing crossbows .
sentences.chinese: 男性角色將不再人爲地扭曲自己的手腕時，發射弩。

sentences.english: These artillery pieces resemble giant crossbows , on a simple wheeled carriage.
sentences.chinese: 這種攻城器實際上是一個裝在輪式載具上的大弩。

sentences.english: Crossbowmen are also equipped with a long sword.
sentences.chinese: 弩兵們同時還配有長劍，以備近身肉搏。

sentences.english: And our target is to rank the first in crossbow line in the world within five years .
sentences.chinese: 公司的目標是五年內爭創世界弩行業第一名。

sentences.english: King north still insist on your own ideas, the teacher should be crossbow thrown away.
sentences.chinese: 王師北仍舊堅持己見，應將弩扔掉。

sentences.english: The crossbow uses the arrow is short.
For use in melee Genoese Crossbowmen are also equipped with a long sword.
sentences.chinese: 弩兵們同時還配有長劍，以備近身肉搏。

sentences.english: Mezz Shots should now play the correct animations for bows and crossbows.
sentences.chinese: 閣樓射門現在應該發揮正確的動畫弓箭和弩。

sentences.english: Superior Italian crossbow garrison unit armoured with brigandine and a pavise.
sentences.chinese: 熱那亞巨盾弩兵是精銳弩兵，裝備鑲甲和全身巨盾。

definition: a bow (weapon)/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to bend/to arch (one's back etc)
firearms (in historical context)/flintlock (old powder and shot firearm)
